channel.title: WWII on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in WWII on Rusland 1

item.title: The Motherland Calls! Mother of all Statues
item.description: Facts and Figures More facts and figures about The Motherland Calls (also known as Mother Russia) can be found on Wikipedia in English, Dutch, and Russian. Also see The Motherland Calls – Mother Russia (Historiek.net) and «Родина-мать зовет!» 10 Facts about the Monument (Culture.

item.title: Mark Bernes – Dark Is the Night (Тёмная ночь)
item.description: Lyrics and explanation The song has its own page on Wikipedia. See Dark Is the Night (Soviet song) and the Russian version. Check Soundtimes.ru for a brief history and interesting facts. Definitely watch Songs from the film “Two Soldiers” performed by Mark Bernes (Первая Столица, 2015, 9 m).
